modShortDescription: Sets the Zombie Loot Bags so they stick around for 15 minutes. This also increases the chances of a Zombie Loot Bag dropping.
modDescription:
Sets the Zombie Loot Bags so they stick around for 15 minutes. This ensures even on a bloodmoon, your Zombie Loot Bags will still be around on the ground at the end of the night.

This also increases the chances of a Zombie Loot Bag dropping. Please see the chart below:

* All Normal [Zombies](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) (zombieTemplate): 20%
* Feral Zombies: 25%
* Radiated Zombies: 25%
* Wight Feral Zombies: 30%
* Wight Radiated Zombies: 30%

**[Download](https://github.com/XelaNull/7DTD-ZombieLootbag_Increase/archive/A19_1.0.zip)** for A19  
**[Download](https://github.com/XelaNull/7DTD-ZombieLootbag_Increase/archive/A18.3_1.3.zip)** for A18

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17503-zombie-lootbag-increase/).

**Credits:** [ShoudenKalferas](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/shoudenkalferas/)
